docs.snippet: Four teenagers were charged with capital murder on Tuesday in the beating death of a graduate student from China not far from the University of Southern California campus in Los Angeles, prosecutors said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Four teenagers were charged with capital murder on Tuesday in the beating death of a graduate student from China not far from the University of Southern California campus in Los Angeles, prosecutors said.

headline.main: Four California Teens Charged in Murder of China Graduate Student

docs.snippet: Vance Worley tossed a four-hitter for his first career shutout, and the Pittsburgh Pirates pounded Madison Bumgarner early in a 5-0 win over the struggling San Francisco Giants on Monday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Vance Worley tossed a four-hitter for his first career shutout, and the Pittsburgh Pirates pounded Madison Bumgarner early in a 5-0 win over the struggling San Francisco Giants on Monday night.

docs.snippet: At first Oscar-winning actress Octavia Spencer thought she was seeing early concert footage of James Brown but then was told  it was a screen test by Chadwick Boseman to play the "Godfather of Soul" in the new biopic "Get On Up."...

docs.snippet: Jones is the only University of Kentucky athlete to have his number, 27, retired in two sports, football and basketball. He became known as Wah Wah because that was how his younger sister pronounced his given name, Wallace....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jones is the only University of Kentucky athlete to have his number, 27, retired in two sports, football and basketball. He became known as Wah Wah because that was how his younger sister pronounced his given name, Wallace.
docs.abstract: Wah Wah Jones, a multitalented athlete at the University of Kentucky in the late 1940s, who starred on the legendary coach Adolph Rupp’s national championship basketball teams and Bear Bryant’s resurgent football squads, dies at age 88.

headline.main: Wah Wah Jones, Versatile Kentucky Athlete, Dies at 88
headline.print_headline: Wah Wah Jones, Versatile Kentucky Athlete, Dies at 88

docs.snippet: Four teens were charged Tuesday with murder in the beating of a University of Southern California graduate student with a baseball bat and wrench as he walked to his off-campus apartment after meeting with a study group....

headline.main: 4 Teens Charged With Murder in USC Student's Death
